page.title: 18Wroxton Abbey Courses.
page.content: The students who come from all over the U.S.A. are here to learn all about England. They study English history, English literature, English landscape, economics etc. There are 18 courses of which the students can choose any 6, these are run by English lecturers. The academic year begins in September and lasts for 14 weeks. The following term runs from January to May. From June until July the university holds post graduate courses and these are followed by courses for American business men. During August the university is out of session, and so the Abbey is available for conferences held by English firms. Students normally come for 14 weeks and up to 70 can be accommodated. Generally there are 40 to 45 in students in residence.
